resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: id
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Used as an RDN when naming an instance of the object class.

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: trafficRuleId
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: The identifier of the traffic rule

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: priority
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: The priority of the associated traffic rule

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: trafficFilter
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: The traffic filter used to identify specific flow/packets that need to be handled by the MEC host

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: action
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: The action to be applied to a packet in case it matches the traffic rule or RAB filter rule
